channel.description: Recent content in updates on canicodenow

item.title: My situation, or 'so why are you learning to code?’
item.description: It’s about time I followed my goals. My job is fine – I work as a content editor, managing a local authority website – but would I be happy doing that forever? No. I’m good at it and it pays the bills, but I don’t feel that buzz I’m always told you’re meant to feel. I never knew what I wanted to be growing up, but I’m starting to realise web development is for me.
